content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: RotateUserCredentialSecret path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/identity/v1/users/{user_id}/credentials/{credential_id}/rotate content: params
name userid
desc a user id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name credentialid
desc the id of the api client credential to rotate secrets for
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum create a new api secret
desc the client secret is returned only once and is not stored by stackpath please take care to save this response
responses
200
identityrotateusercredentialsecretresponse
type obj
props
id
type str
desc the api credentials unique identifier
name
type str
desc the api credentials name
clientid
type str
desc the api credentials oauth2 client id
clientsecret
type str
desc the api credentials oauth2 client secret

the client secret is returned only once and is not stored by stackpath please take care to save this response
desc a response from a request to generate a new api client secret for a user
title: 4_Authentication_RotateUserCredentialSecret_22.json
